name: Poly Wizard
description:
Top-Down shooter where you are a wizard looking for his long lost staff, you will be killing skeletons but be careful because after you kill them they will have a chance of spawning 3 more skeletons if you do not pick up their bones.

Use WASD to move, LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot, and SPACE to collect bones.

You are a wizard looking for his staff that the skeletons took from your father a long time ago, but as you were searching the skeletons got you and put you in a dungeon with 11 rooms, looks like they have prepared some tough challenges for you, Good luck!
